sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_ex_sp.TopicPopularityUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Utility script include to populate the popularity of topics</description> <name>TopicPopularityUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var TopicPopularityUtil = Class.create(); TopicPopularityUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(TopicPopularityUtilSNC,{ initialize: function() { TopicPopularityUtilSNC.prototype.initialize.apply(this, arguments); }, type: 'TopicPopularityUtil' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-19 07:59:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2d1620d06b907010d70bc141ee44afae</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>TopicPopularityUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Employee Center" source="sn_ex_sp">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center">4249e63a28d54d61bb6fbf61fd86cccb</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2d1620d06b907010d70bc141ee44afae</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-05-25 12:19:38</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
